summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Spencer Green Hotel HMS with major UI updates. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI is working excellently with proper dark emerald header, hamburger menu, admin login functionality, special offers carousel, booking engine, Kempinski-style rooms layout, and Google Maps integration. All core features tested successfully with only minor UI issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Password field remains visible for non-admin emails instead of being hidden
Modal opened to 'Special Offers' title instead of expected booking form title

passed_tests: Backend API authentication with admin@spencergreenhotel.com / admin123
All room endpoints returning correct data (18/18 API tests passed)
Admin dashboard stats and management features
Homepage loads with dark emerald header (rgb(2, 44, 34))
Hamburger menu functionality for all screen sizes
Check Reservation page admin email detection and password field appearance
Admin login redirects to dashboard successfully
Special Offers section with horizontal scroll (5 offer cards)
Booking engine fully visible and functional
Booking modal opening with form fields
Kamar Kami section with full-width layout (6 room containers)
Google Maps iframe positioned above footer
Footer with 4 social media icons (TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp)
Admin dashboard accessible with navigation and stats
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fixes: 1) Hide password field for non-admin emails in CheckReservation component, 2) Fix booking modal title display. These are low priority cosmetic issues that don't affect core functionality.
